Function Being Tested: System rejects negative initial cash amount
Expected Output: System displays error message and requests valid cash amount

Function Being Tested: System rejects zero initial cash amount
Expected Output: System displays error message requesting a positive cash amount

Function Being Tested: System accepts maximum initial cash amount
Expected Output: System accepts and is turned on

Function Being Tested: System rejects non-numeric initial cash amount
Expected Output: System displays error message and requests numeric input

Function Being Tested: System rejects decimal initial cash amount
Expected Output: System displays error message and requests whole number

Function Being Tested: System startup after abnormal shutdown
Initial System State: System was improperly shut down (simulated crash)
Expected Output: System performs recovery and requests initial cash amount

Function Being Tested: System displays correct initial state on screen
Input: Activate the on switch and enter valid cash amount
Expected Output: Screen displays ATM Ready or equivalent message

Function Being Tested: System initializes transaction log on startup
Input: Activate the on switch and enter valid cash amount
Expected Output: System creates new log entry with startup timestamp

Function Being Tested: System verifies bank connection on startup
Initial System State: System has just been turned on
Expected Output: System displays connection status (connected/disconnected)

Function Being Tested: Multiple rapid on/off attempts
Input: Rapidly toggle on/off switch multiple times
Expected Output: System handles gracefully without crashing

Function Being Tested: System prevents shutdown during active transaction
Initial System State: System is processing a withdrawal transaction
Expected Output: System displays message that shutdown cannot occur during transaction

Function Being Tested: System prevents shutdown when card is inserted
Initial System State: System has card inserted but no transaction in progress
Expected Output: System displays message to remove card before shutdown

Function Being Tested: System saves transaction log before shutdown
Initial System State: System is on with completed transactions in log
Expected Output: System persists log data before shutting down

Function Being Tested: System displays shutdown confirmation
Expected Output: System displays Shutting down message before turning off

Function Being Tested: System closes bank connection on shutdown
Initial System State: System is on with active bank connection
Expected Output: System properly closes connection before shutdown

Function Being Tested: System handles shutdown during PIN entry
Expected Output: System prevents shutdown and displays appropriate message

Function Being Tested: System clears screen on shutdown
Initial System State: System is on displaying transaction menu
Expected Output: Screen is cleared and displays System Off

Function Being Tested: System records shutdown time in log
Expected Output: Log contains shutdown timestamp entry

Function Being Tested: System handles damaged card with partial data
Initial System State: System is on and not servicing a customer
Expected Output: Card is ejected with error message

Function Being Tested: System validates card number format
Initial System State: System is prompting for card number
Input: Enter invalid format card number (e.g. abc)
Expected Output: System displays error and requests valid numeric card number

Function Being Tested: System handles expired card
Initial System State: System is on and not servicing a customer
Expected Output: System displays Card Expired message and ejects card

Function Being Tested: System times out PIN entry
Input: Wait without entering PIN for extended period
Expected Output: System displays timeout message and ejects card

Function Being Tested: System accepts exactly 3 PIN retries before retention
Expected Output: Card is retained and system displays message to contact bank

Function Being Tested: System retains card after 3 failed PIN attempts
Expected Output: Card is permanently retained and not ejected

Function Being Tested: System handles simultaneous card insertion attempts
Initial System State: System is ready to accept card
Input: Attempt to insert card while one is already in reader
Expected Output: System rejects second card or displays error

Function Being Tested: System validates card against bank database
Initial System State: System is on and not servicing a customer
Expected Output: System communicates with bank to validate card

Function Being Tested: System handles invalid card number from bank
Initial System State: System is prompting for card number
Input: Enter card number not in bank system (e.g. 999)
Expected Output: System displays Invalid Card and returns to ready state

Function Being Tested: System logs card insertion event
Expected Output: Log entry created with card insertion timestamp

Function Being Tested: System handles PIN with leading zeros
Expected Output: System correctly processes PIN and accepts or rejects appropriately

Function Being Tested: System masks PIN entry on display
Expected Output: Display shows asterisks (*) instead of actual digits

Function Being Tested: System prevents PIN from being logged
Input: Enter correct PIN and complete transaction
Expected Output: Transaction log does not contain PIN value

Function Being Tested: System handles cancel during transaction menu
Initial System State: System is displaying transaction type menu
Expected Output: System asks if user wants to perform another transaction

Function Being Tested: System ejects card after session timeout
Input: Wait without input for extended period
Expected Output: System displays timeout message and ejects card

Function Being Tested: System handles withdrawal from savings account
Initial System State: System is displaying account type menu for withdrawal
Expected Output: System displays withdrawal amount menu

Function Being Tested: System handles withdrawal from money market account
Initial System State: System is displaying account type menu for withdrawal
Expected Output: System displays withdrawal amount menu

Function Being Tested: System enforces $20 increment rule
Initial System State: System is requesting custom withdrawal amount
Expected Output: System displays error requesting amount in $20 multiples

Function Being Tested: System dispenses correct number of bills
Expected Output: System dispenses exactly 5 bills of $20

Function Being Tested: System updates cash on hand after withdrawal
Expected Output: System cash inventory decreases to $400

Function Being Tested: System handles maximum withdrawal limit
Expected Output: System processes if sufficient cash and balance exist

Function Being Tested: System rejects withdrawal exceeding daily limit
Initial System State: Customer has already withdrawn daily limit
Expected Output: System displays daily limit exceeded message

Function Being Tested: System handles insufficient ATM cash mid-transaction
Expected Output: System displays insufficient cash message

Function Being Tested: System prints correct account balance on receipt
Initial System State: System is completing withdrawal of $40 from checking ($100 balance)
Expected Output: Receipt shows new balance of $60

Function Being Tested: System handles withdrawal leaving zero balance
Expected Output: Transaction completes with $0 balance

Function Being Tested: System validates minimum withdrawal amount
Input: Attempt to withdraw $0 or negative amount
Expected Output: System displays error message

Function Being Tested: System handles concurrent balance check during withdrawal
Expected Output: System uses most current balance for validation

Function Being Tested: System records withdrawal time on receipt
Expected Output: Receipt shows current date and time

Function Being Tested: System handles bank approval denial
Initial System State: System has sent withdrawal request to bank
Expected Output: System displays denial message and cancels transaction

Function Being Tested: System displays ATM location on receipt
Expected Output: Receipt shows ATM location/ID

Function Being Tested: System handles deposit to savings account
Initial System State: System is displaying account type menu for deposit
Expected Output: System requests deposit amount

Function Being Tested: System handles deposit to money market account
Initial System State: System is displaying account type menu for deposit
Expected Output: System requests deposit amount

Function Being Tested: System accepts large deposit amounts
Expected Output: System accepts and requests envelope

Function Being Tested: System rejects zero or negative deposit amounts
Expected Output: System displays error requesting positive amount

Function Being Tested: System handles deposit envelope timeout
Input: Wait without inserting envelope beyond timeout
Expected Output: System cancels deposit and does not credit account

Function Being Tested: System validates envelope insertion
Expected Output: System accepts envelope and credits account

Function Being Tested: System updates balance correctly after deposit
Expected Output: Account balance shows $150 pending verification

Function Being Tested: System marks deposit as pending verification
Expected Output: Receipt indicates deposit subject to verification

Function Being Tested: System logs both deposit messages to bank
Expected Output: Log shows initial approval and envelope acceptance messages

Function Being Tested: System handles minimum deposit amount validation
Expected Output: System accepts or rejects based on policy

Function Being Tested: System prevents transfer from account to same account
Initial System State: System is displaying transfer to account menu
Input: Select same account as transfer from
Expected Output: System displays error message preventing same-account transfer

Function Being Tested: System handles transfer exceeding source balance
Input: Enter amount greater than source account balance
Expected Output: System displays insufficient funds message

Function Being Tested: System updates both accounts correctly
Expected Output: Savings shows $950 checking shows $150

Function Being Tested: System handles maximum transfer amount
Expected Output: System processes if sufficient balance

Function Being Tested: System validates minimum transfer amount
Expected Output: System displays error message

Function Being Tested: System prints both account balances on receipt
Expected Output: Receipt shows updated balances for both accounts

Function Being Tested: System handles transfer leaving zero balance in source
Expected Output: Transaction completes with $0 source balance

Function Being Tested: System handles all possible account combinations
Initial System State: System is at account selection menus
Input: Transfer between all 6 possible account pairs
Expected Output: All valid combinations work correctly

Function Being Tested: System displays inquiry for savings account
Initial System State: System is displaying account type menu
Expected Output: System displays and prints savings balance ($1000)

Function Being Tested: System displays inquiry for money market account
Initial System State: System is displaying account type menu
Expected Output: System displays and prints money market balance ($5000)

Function Being Tested: System shows available vs total balance
Initial System State: System is performing inquiry with pending deposit
Expected Output: Receipt shows both available and total balance

Function Being Tested: System performs inquiry without affecting balance
Expected Output: Balance remains $100 after inquiry

Function Being Tested: System allows multiple inquiries in one session
Input: Select yes for another transaction and inquiry again
Expected Output: Second inquiry completes successfully

Function Being Tested: System prints inquiry receipt with timestamp
Expected Output: Receipt shows current date time and ATM location

Function Being Tested: System handles bank communication failure during transaction
Expected Output: System displays error and allows retry or cancel

Function Being Tested: System handles invalid account type selection
Expected Output: System displays error and re-displays menu

Function Being Tested: System validates all transactions against bank
Initial System State: System is processing any transaction type
Expected Output: Log shows message sent to bank and response received

Function Being Tested: System handles receipt printer failure
Expected Output: System displays printer error but completes transaction

Function Being Tested: System handles session with all transaction types
Initial System State: System is idle after card/PIN entry
Input: Perform withdrawal deposit transfer and inquiry
Expected Output: All four transactions complete successfully

Function Being Tested: System handles rapid repeated transactions
Initial System State: System is asking for another transaction
Input: Select yes and perform 5 quick consecutive transactions
Expected Output: All transactions process correctly

Function Being Tested: System enforces transaction limits per session
Expected Output: System allows or enforces per-session limit based on policy

Function Being Tested: System clears sensitive data between sessions
Input: Start new session with different card
Expected Output: No data from previous customer is accessible
